summary: Website for RK Day 2 Day Facilitys â€” a cleaning and facilities service offering housekeeping, deep cleaning, and grouting services. Contact numbers: 99624 42558 and 7358440081.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Premium professional cleaning team at work in a bright modern interior, warm natural light, teal accents (hero-bg.dim_1440x600.png)
- Subtle light abstract geometric texture with soft teal and cream tones, clean and minimal (why-choose-us-bg.dim_1440x400.png)

## Edit Images
- Enhance vibrancy and contrast, sharpen details (hero-bg.dim_1440x600.png > hero-bg.dim_1440x600.png)
- Slightly brighten and add a soft warm overlay (services-bg.dim_1440x400.png > services-bg.dim_1440x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage with the company name 'RK Day 2 Day Facilitys', a compelling tagline about professional cleaning and facility services, and a prominent hero section with a call-to-action button linking to the contact section.

Create a Services section that clearly lists and describes the three offered services: Housekeeping, Deep Cleaning, and Grouting Service. Each service should have an icon, a title, and a short description.

Create a Contact section displaying the phone number '99624 42558' with a prominent 'Call Us' button that initiates a phone call on mobile devices. Include a friendly call-to-action message encouraging users to get in touch.

Apply a clean, professional visual theme using warm neutral tones (e.g., whites, soft creams, and teal/green accents) to evoke cleanliness and trustworthiness. Use a modern sans-serif typography, card-based layout for services, smooth scroll navigation, and a sticky header with the company name and navigation links.

Render the generated hero background image and service section background as static assets in the frontend. Use the generated images (hero-bg.dim_1440x600.png, services-bg.dim_1440x400.png) placed in frontend/public/assets/generated.
Add the second phone number '7358440081' alongside the existing '99624 42558' in the Contact section and Footer. Both numbers must be displayed as tappable tel: links on mobile devices.

Redesign the website to an advanced, premium-quality professional level. Enhancements should include: a richer hero section with animated text or subtle motion effects, an enhanced services section with detailed feature bullet lists and a call-to-action per service card, a 'Why Choose Us' or trust-building section highlighting reliability, experience, and quality guarantees, improved typography hierarchy using the existing font configuration, polished hover and transition animations throughout, and a more visually compelling overall layout while preserving the teal/cream brand palette.

Update the hero background image to a more vivid, high-quality professional cleaning environment scene that better reflects a premium brand, and generate a 'Why Choose Us' section background image with a subtle, clean texture or abstract light pattern.

new_feature_requests.summary: Homepage with company name, tagline, and hero section
Services section listing housekeeping, deep cleaning, and grouting services
Add second contact number 7358440081 alongside existing number 99624 42558
Rebuild as a professional advanced website with enhanced design and features
